trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Lee's Summit
There were no other sightings in Lee's Summit on or around July 2nd 2010
divs: sighting detailsglowing orange-red ball, moving in a straight path, low altitude, flew in front of the whole town of peaple at a fireworks display. went right over our heads, no sound at all, seemed to be an aircraft that was engulfed in an orange ball of light, moving without any noise what so ever. i did see the object agian 07\04\10 aprox same time 9pm flying in a different derection, but lower to the earth, almost over the house. at first sighting it seemed to be an aircraft without any thrust or navigation lights. then realized that there was no propulsion sound at all. when the object was directly over head it did have a plane like feature, however it was surounded by a glowing orange-red ball of light. there were no signs of thrust from the rear of the object.
Summary: Glowing orange-red ball, moving in a straight path,
